name: VR Moon Mission Cardboard 3D
description:
VR Moon Mission 3D Cardboard game enables you to feel how to walk on the moon, plus complete a rocket launch mission while you escape from the aliens.

The virtual reality graphics are very detailed. Walk nearby the craters, explore the surface, look at the blue Earth from moon.

How to play:
It is very easy. Just look at where you want to go.
Activate / deactivate rocket, solar panel by just looking at them
Kill aliens when you target them

Please vote for our app so that we will be adding more exciting VR apps and develop it better.
